commit.message:
re PR c++/14865 (No instantiation of VTT at -O1)


	PR C++/14865
	* decl2.c (maybe_emit_vtables):  Always import_export_vtable for the
	reachability analysis.

From-SVN: r83707

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@
+2004-06-26  Jan Hubicka  <jh@suse.cz>
+
+	PR C++/14865
+	* decl2.c (maybe_emit_vtables):  Always import_export_vtable for the
+	reachability analysis.
+
